name: Cream laundry bag
description: A gorgeous cream laundry bag with Art deco pattern and cream cotton tape drawstring closure. Just the thing for keeping your laundry looking attractive – or for protecting delicate items in your suitcase. There is a wide handle on one side means the bag can be hung open on a wall hook for easy access. Approximate size is 60cmx41cm (24inx16in) Designed and handmade by us in England. For more information, contact sales@geminga.co.uk Postage to UK £2.50 Everywhere else £4.50 See more of our products at geminga.co.uk and www.flickr.com/photos/27684216@N04/

name: Green and cream kitchen apron (adult)
description: A great kitchen apron in a green and cream stripe, adult size with double pocket on the front and a loop for a tea-towel or oven gloves. This is a good sized apron that comes around your sides to help protect your clothes more effectively. Length approximately 76cm / 30in with cream cotton ties for the neck loop and waist. See the matching child size apron to get that ‘dads and lads’ look! Wash at 40 deg. Wash dark colours separately. Designed and handmade by us in England. For more information, contact sales@geminga.co.uk Postage to UK £2.00 Everywhere else £4.00 See more of our products at geminga.co.uk and www.flickr.com/photos/27684216@N04/

name: Green and cream kitchen apron (child)
description: A child size kitchen apron in a groovy green and cream stripe with double pocket on the front and a loop for a tea-towel or oven gloves. The neck loop is in two pieces so it can be tied at the right length for your little cook’s height. This is a good sized apron that comes around your sides to help protect your clothes more effectively. Length approximately 52cm / 20.5in with cream cotton ties for the neck loop and waist. See the matching adult size apron to get that ‘dads and lads’ look! Wash at 40 deg. Wash dark colours separately. Designed and handmade by us in England. For more information, contact sales@geminga.co.uk Postage to UK £2.00 Everywhere else £4.00 See more of our products at geminga.co.uk and www.flickr.com/photos/27684216@N04/

name: Blue cordura style tote bag
description: A funky blue tote bag made from cordura type fabric lined with blue check gingham. Great for those quick dashes to the shops! The handles are also lined and of a generous length (approx 60cm / 24in) allowing you to have the bag over your shoulder (unless you are very tall!) Approxmate size 38cmx37cm (15inx14.5in) Designed and handmade by us in England. For more information, contact sales@geminga.co.uk Postage to UK £2.50 Everywhere else £4.50 See more of our products at geminga.co.uk and www.flickr.com/photos/27684216@N04/

name: House and garden apron
description: A great way to keep all those household or garden items with you! Perfect for cleaning materials, cloths, mobile phone, secateurs, trowels, string, labels, gloves – or even a sneaky chocolate bar! A hard-wearing blue cordura apron with purple cord pockets and blue cotton waist tape. There is a loop to one side for duster ot tea-towel. The waist band is stiffened for added comfort. This version has 5 pockets. (The sprays and cloth in the picture are not included!) Designed and handmade by us in England. For more information, contact sales@geminga.co.uk Postage to UK £2.50 Everywhere else £4.50 See more of our products at geminga.co.uk and www.flickr.com/photos/27684216@N04/
